name: Postie v0.1
description:
Welcome to Postie An early prototype from a 1 week game jam. 

Deliver tabloid news to the disgrunted citizens of Parcelia, even when no one wants you around.

WASD to move
SPACE to jump
F to hide newspaper

Credits:

Pixel art, programming and design by GreatLemi

programming, design and logo by Leon Nikolai

Special thanks to Sigve for writing 3 lines of code and giving rejected ideas

Music :

Holfix - Stroll in the Sun

Holfix - Stroll in the Sun (Chiptune Remix)

Link to his YouTube channel:

 https://www.youtube.com/user/holfix/video
